lcli.userConfigNotFound: User configuration file not found at {{ .UserConfigPath }}. A new one will be created.
lcli.deletionConfirm: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete? (y/N):

lcli.booleanWithValue: Option '{{ .Option }}' does not take an argument.
lcli.ambiguousOptionValue: Option '{{ .Option }}' argument is ambiguous. To specify a value that starts with a dash, use '{{ .Option }}=<value>'.
lcli.cfgCouldNotBeLoaded: Configuration file could not be loaded from {{ .UserConfigPath }}.

co.coError: Warning: Could not load module for command {{ .Command }}. Skipping completion generation.

cfg.editorNotFound: No $EDITOR environment variable found. Please set $EDITOR to your preferred text editor.

generic.header: telocitycli: A scaffold for making CLIs scripts.

commandDescriptions.hw: A simple example command that prints a greeting.

generic.footer: For more information on any command, use `telocitycli <command> --help`.

flags.edit: Open the user configuration file in the default editor.
flags.remove: Delete the user configuration files (prompts for confirmation).

hw.description: A demo command that prints a 'Hello, World!' message sourced from the configuration file.
